sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "

It is given that UVWX is a parallelogram and Y is a point on the side VW and XY when produced meets UV at point Z . Then prove that
\[
	\frac{XY }{YZ } = \frac{XW }{VZ } 
\]
and
\[
	\frac{XZ }{XY } = \frac{UZ }{XW }
\]
\newline
tikzpicture{}
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "$$\text{Since UVWX is a parallelogram, we have $UX \parallel VW $, and $XW = UV $.

Now, in triangle UZX , we have $VY \parallel UX $.}$$
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{YZ }{\input[s1v1]{}\input[s1v2]{} } = \frac{VZ }{XW }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{YZ }{XY } = \frac{VZ }{XW }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{XY }{YZ } = \frac{\input[s2v1]{}\input[s2v2]{}}{VZ }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, adding 1 to both sides of the above equation, we get
\[
	\frac{XY }{YZ } + 1 = \frac{XW }{\input[s3v1]{}\input[s3v2]{}} + 1
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{XY + YZ }{YZ } = \frac{XW + VZ }{VZ }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{XZ }{YZ } = \frac{\input[s4v1]{}\input[s4v2]{} + VZ }{VZ }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{XZ }{YZ } = \frac{UZ }{VZ }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, dividing the above two results, we get
\[
	\frac{XZ }{\input[s5v1]{}\input[s5v2]{} } = \frac{UZ }{XW }
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Hence proved
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["X", "Y"], "text": "$$\text{Using basic proportionality theorem, $\frac{YZ }{XY } = \frac{VZ }{XW }$}$$"}, {"data": ["X", "W"], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking reciprocal of the previous equation, we get $\Rightarrow \frac{XY }{YZ } = \frac{XW }{VZ }$}$$"}, {"data": ["V", "Z"], "text": "$$\text{Upon adding 1, we get $\frac{XY }{YZ } + 1 = \frac{XW }{VZ } + 1$, and further simplification, we get $\frac{XY + YZ }{YZ } = \frac{XW + VZ }{VZ}$}$$"}, {"data": ["U", "V"], "text": "$$\text{Since, $XY + YZ = XZ$, $XW = UV$ and $UV + VZ= UZ$, we get $\frac{XZ }{YZ } = \frac{UZ }{VZ }$}$$"}, {"data": ["X", "Y"], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
